attributes.action: bring back the word england in the media
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the word england is not used on television and has been substituted by britain. the weather forcast on sky and others mention scotland, wales and northern ireland but say in britain it is raining in devon? is this a government directive?

rejection.details: This is an issue for media which is independent of government. Please contact media organisations directly.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
